actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution disapproving certain recommendations transmitted by the President on January 17, 1977, concerning rates of pay for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Disapproves the recommendations of the President transmitted to Congress, pursuant to the Federal Salary Act of 1967, recommending rates of pay for: (1) the Vice President, Members of Congress and the Resident Commissioner from Puerto Rico; (2) specified positions in the legislative branch; (3) specified judicial personnel; (4) specified positions under the Executive Schedule; and (5) the Board of Governors of the United States Postal Service.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving certain recommendations transmitted by the President on January 17, 1977, concerning rates of pay for Members of Congress.
